welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Longchamps, Argentina! Get ready to be enchanted by the city's picturesque landscapes and rich cultural heritage. We invite you to explore and discover all the charm that Longchamps has to offer. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The secondary terminal for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The newest terminal for both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, serving domestic and regional flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A secondary terminal at Aeroparque Jorge Newbery Airport, mainly used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at El Palomar Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at El Palomar Airport, primarily used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Wifi is available throughout the airport, but may be limited in some areas.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
